# syrup

š-r-b < √gär ≠ gerb?

š-r-b < z-r-p > t-r-p

𒄰 ≈ 𒄭𒁁 ŠAR.BAᵈ ≈ şorba "soup"

𒋭 dišpu ⇔ syrup

𒄰 TU₇ 𜏝 tu ζω •ƫu
𒄰 TU₇ Topf (Hohlmaß) "soup"
𒄰 TU₇ •Turpa > чорпа čorpa soup
𒄰 TU₇ זופּ zup zuppa /tsuppa/ •zurpa /tsrpa/ ⇔ streba
𒄰 TU₇ ζωμός zōmós δωμός dōmós
𒄰 TU₇ 汤 tāng ⇔ Trank

𒊷 ŠAᵖ •sap sirup @ 𒉪 tree 𒌁 TER
𒊷 ŠAᵗ sweet

𐀁𐀨𐀺 ˢe-ra-wo ᵞerapho έλαιον ˢolive / oil

𒋭 syrup

𓋴 𓅨 𓂋 | drink | absorb ش ر ب š-r-b !
𓋴 𓅨 𓂋 | drink | säufer(n)

's-r-b "make enter" bir

Semitic root s-r-p encloses all kinds of drinking and liquids in all grammatical varieties:
surpa : sourpa@LAT! शोरबा śorbā чорпа t͡ʃorpə սուպ sup სუფი supʰi асуҧ ɑsupʰ "soup" (Lithuanian)
syrup : thick liquid sorbet > sap Saft Soma?
slurp : شرب širib 𓋴𓅨𓂋 drink, absorb, sorbere > harbi(drunk) > arbi@Armenian (sur.bare)
saugᵛer: 𓋴𓅨𓂋 သောက် sauk suck (gh⋍ƒ⋍ph)
şarap: wine 𓋴𓏌𓎸 ⋍ sirup juice ⇔ beer
carafe: bottle 𓂝𓃀𓈙 | wine jar | •crp > srp ≠ 𓎡

𔕮 sa₅ sarap@carafe

𓋴 𓏌 𓎸 | wine of Pelusium | saraph

𒀊 AB < 𓎛 𓃀 𓃀 𓈅 𓈗 | water| PIE root *h₂ep- < sap šap šá-ap-pan-na saft ⇔ sirup

𓇋 𓂋 𓊪 𓏊 𓏥 jrp ⇔ شَرَاب šarāb (wine) ⇔ 𓏉 socks!?
→ Azerbaijani: şərab
→ Kazakh: шарап (şarap)
→ Middle Armenian: շարաբ (šarab), շարապ (šarap), շէրապ (šērap)
→ Persian: شراب (šarâb)
→ Bengali: শরাব (śôrab)
→ Northern Luri: شرۏ (šerö)
→ Hindustani:
Hindi: शराब (śarāb)
Urdu: شراب (śarāb)
→ English: sharab
→ Ottoman Turkish: شراب (şarab)
Turkish: şarap

𓇋 𓂋 𓊪 𓏊 𓏥 jrp > شَرَاب šarāb (wine)
𓇋 𓂋 𓊪 𓏉|| wine |•phth-r-p / j-r-p > s-r-p > ᶠherb > irp > irvine > wine
𓊃 𓅨 𓂋 𓏏||drink-supply ?|sirup.ty šakrā
𓋴 𓂋 𓆑 𓊮||hot|scharf! +++ serpent
𓋴𓂋𓅓𓏏𓈓 სვამს svɑms drink •swarmed 𓊃𓅨𓂋𓏊 swear
𓋴𓂋𓅓𓏏𓈓 sermat > soma/med/mead 疏麻 Shuma
𓋴𓂋𓅓𓏏𓈓 sirambit > s-r-p
𓋴 𓂋 𓆑 𓊮||hot|scharf! +++ serpent
𓋴 𓏌 𓎸||wine of Pelusium|saraph +++++ sirup@caraffe

𒅘 šatû schütten (drink)
𒅘 šatû ⇔ saturated

trunk ⇔ 𓏏 𓐍 𓏌||be drunk, drink deep|

𓇋 𓂋 𓏉 ⇔ ferment
𓇋 𓂋 𓊪 𓏊 𓏥 irvine wine
𓇋 𓂋 𓊪 𓏉|| wine |•phth-r-p water-ruby Rubin>irvine>wine

𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓏊 | oil, conifer resin ? | Saft sāp “amber, resin, pomade”

𓈎 𓏇 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓈓 | gum, resin | gummi™

𒅆𒅗𒊑 ši-ka-ri 𒁉 šikaru™ ⋍ 𓎛 𓏘 𓏏 “beer” scirup > sirup

𒋩𒊒𒁍 sur-ru-pu
𒋩𒊒𒁍 to burn (up)

⇔ šá-ap-pan-na; šap grape

𓉐 𓂋 𓏏 𓍁 𓈓 | fruit| ⲟⲩⲧⲁϩ vrtah fruita' ⲉⲧⲁϩ (ətah?) ⇔ sirup Obst? οπώρα opóra offer @ Euphrat

𒋭 làl syrup, honey ⇔ Šurpu "burning" @ 𒀭𒇽𒋭 lú.làl
𒋭 µlàl ⇔ бал bal 꿀 kkul 밀 mil miel "honey"
𒋭 #dišpu ܕܒܫܐ deḇšā דּוּבְשָׁא dûḇšā ⇔ ደምስ dämǝsǝ (ambi) •dembsa dugos dišpu® > debora

𒆗 KALL = 𓎟 ≈ 𓎡 𒂁𒆗 zurzub₂ 𒂁𒆗 #şurşuppum Suppen-Kelle soup-cauldron Suppen-Napf :

𒆗 nap 𓎟 ≈ 𓋞 kal-du ☑
